name: speckit-progress-reporter
description: Reports progress updates to state file when speckit steps complete

hooks.prompt: If the tool output indicates a speckit step completed (specify, clarify, plan, tasks, analyze, or implement), update the state file at .claude/orchestrator.state.json to reflect progress. Add the completed step to steps_completed array and update current_step. Return 'UPDATED' if state was updated, 'SKIP' otherwise.
